- Exterior wall: textured stucco, beige; location: garage fa√ßade adjacent to the door opening.
- Door: white metal sectional overhead door; location: single-car garage opening.
- Door/jamb condition: slight deterioration/paint wear at the jamb top; possible moisture intrusion risk at edge.
- Ground/vegetation: sparse grass with weeds; location: base of wall around the door; potential foundation moisture exposure.
- Debris: plywood boards and wood scraps piled against wall near left of door; trip/hazard and pest attractant.
- Utilities: curved black conduit/ hose attached to wall near left of door; verify secure mounting and clearance.
